replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Type in any username you wish, and click Enter Game.
Click on Multiplayer, instead of Singleplayer.
Enter the IP of a server, then click Connect.

Some servers set a whilelist , you must ask to join it.

replies.author: crazyforever
replies.txt_content:
MinecraftSP依然可以用阿
1.8客戶端安裝好以後
用MinecraftSP執行就好了
要連上server要看那個server是不是有反盜版 白名單之類的

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: multiplayer--add server--type in server name i.e. minecraft--below type in ip  i.e. 127.1.1.0--click done--look at the little icon next to server's name, that represents signal of server （like wireless internet)--click direct connect or join server

replies.author: 火星蚂蚁
replies.txt_content: 都会说英语啊  我看见英语就头晕
